description:
EpicMix – Capture. Connect. Share.
Unlock a whole new mountain experience with EpicMix at Vail, Beaver Creek, Breckenridge, Keystone, Canyons, Heavenly, Northstar, Kirkwood, Afton Alps, and Mt. Brighton.

• View and purchase photos captured by on-mountain professional photographers.
• Track your progress in Ski and Snowboard School with EpicMix Academy.
• Race against your friends, family and even World Cup Champion Lindsey Vonn.
• Track your vertical feet.
• Earn digital pins for your activity and accomplishments on the mountain.
• Collect points for each digital pin you earn.
• Be part of the EpicMix leaderboard. Compete against the EpicMix community, your family, or Facebook friends.
• See where your Facebook friends are skiing or riding and what they’ve accomplished.
• Connect with Facebook and Twitter to automatically share your photos, activity, and special accomplishments.
• Access trail maps, lift status, run conditions, weather reports, web cams, and the latest traffic info for all six mountains.
 
Note: You must have an RF enabled Season Pass, Epic Day lift ticket, or PEAKS card to use EpicMix.
releaseNotes:
-  Updated EpicMix Academy to include ‘In-Progress’ and ‘Mastered’ tracking for Academy skills.
-  Added EpicMix Academy pins for all resorts to capture your achievements with Ski and Ride School.
-  Updated resort maps for the 2014/2015 ski season.
